item.description:
What: Hartford Asatru Meetup Pubmoot

Where: East Side Restaurant, New Britain

When: This Saturday, from 8:00PM until ???

Why:
1. Because it's been an insanely busy month or so at the office and I need the break!
2. To celebrate my tax refund. ;)
3. And because a couple of new people have joined the meetup group recently and still some other folks that we didn't get a chance to meet in December

Yes, this is short notice. But to make amends, the first round of drinks and appetizers is on me! And those of you who didn't already have plans... no excuses! (No event fee, other than paying for your own food & drink after the first round).

Info/Directions:
http://www.eastsidere...

HOPE TO SEE YOU THERE!

Wassail,
Mike

group.name: Connecticut & Western Mass Asatru Meetup Group

item.name: Pubmoot this Saturday, March 10
